Name: MotoGP™13
About the game: 2013 Riders, teams and tracks; both simulation and accessible bike handling with scalable aids; photorealistic graphics with TV style interface; ingame voice over by official MotoGP™ commentators; first person elements such as the helmet view and 3D pits to put you in the rider’s shoes. This is MotoGP™13, the official MotoGP™ videogame: try Career Mode, rising from a Moto3™ wildcard to the MotoGP™ World Champion, or challenge your friends in Split Screen or Online Championship.
Meta Title: MotoGP™13: Jun 20, 2013, Milestone S.r.l. and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MotoGP™13? Check out the release date (Jun 20, 2013), developer insights from Milestone S.r.l., and a complete game summary.
